main event: Two pilots reported seeing a series of lights off the coast of South Carolina and Georgia on September 27, 1967.
interesting points: The first pilot saw five to seven greenish lights in a crisscross pattern,The lights were reported to have been visible for 1-2 minutes and then suddenly went out,The second pilot reported seeing the same lights forming a triangle formation 11 minutes later at a distance of 135 miles away,The sightings occurred in clear weather conditions with no known military flights in the area at the same time,The investigation into the sightings concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: five to seven lights in a crisscross pattern
witness description: pilots who observed the lights during their flights
